Summary: driving with mom said ohh a shooting star but then it didnt go away kept descending and then diasappeared behind houses in distance was not a shooting star or airpalne
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving with mom She was taking me to gym, said ohh a shooting star but then it didnt go away kept descending and then diasappeared behind houses. Then we got excited and wondered what it was said to fast to be airplane too big and lasted to long to be shooting star no end trail like on a comet as not a shooting star or airpalne
